generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with multiple lanes, tram tracks, and road markings, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Several buildings are visible on both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are present along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along both sides of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including utility poles and possibly traffic light poles.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, near the parked cars.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- train: The tram tracks in the middle of the road indicate the presence of a train (tram) system, although the train itself is not visible in the image.
